transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Hanji sir Preeti Rathore baat kar rahi hu India Mart head office se business college ji mam samajh gaya ji theek hu mam
Customer: Achcha actually maine call kiya tha subah se wahi aapke concern pe chal raha tha matlab buyer supply team ke sath mein abhi ja ke resolve ho gaya hai aapki services resume kar di hai unhone aur thoda sa sir ye sab chezo ka dhyan rakhna kyuki matlab hamari jo current profile hai uske upar bhi paas mein conflicts aaye hue hai kai sare to maine sab chezo ka bhi jawab to diya hi hai but please do take care of these things specially matlab
Customer: Main pura khyal rakhta hu aur mam aap baki buyer se bhi baat karke dekh lijiye un logo ka bhi case na wo ho gaya hoga kya hota hai aapko kaise pata
Executive: Mam pata ye nahi keh raha hu mam aap unhone karke dekh lijiye
Customer: Nahi nahi main main bata raha hu aapko main karan isliye bata raha hu main aapko ye bol rahi hu dekhiye sir jo bhi hai but fir bhi main aapko ab chahe aap jaise bhi samjhe direct indirect but please do take care of these things kyuki nahi nahi mam aap mujhe galat samajh rahe ho main aisa kuch nahi dekhiye mam bata raha hu nahi nahi main to current wali profile pe aapke complaints hai na unko lekar ke bhi bol rahi hu current wali profile ke upar bhi jo Deepak group of company wali hai na usme bhi matlab ye hai ki resolve hui hai but conflicts kai sare hai even India Mart ka norms ye hai ki ek saal mein agar aapki paanch complaint hoti hai to fir wo service tab bhi band kar dete hai matlab mam dekhiye hum log saman bechte hai mam aisa hai ki dekho hum agar sale karenge to complaint to aayega hi aayega
Customer: Nahi sir dekho main wahi to bol rahi hu tabhi to wo thoda sa take care karna hota hai na ki matlab kyu aayegi itna complaint mam dekhiye main bata raha hu main pehle amazon flipkart me sabse seller reh chuka hu hum sahi saman bechte hai to bhi return aata hai jo bhi mam complaint to rehta hi rehta hai
Executive: Dekhiye return complaint ka main aapko wahi bata rahi hu ki ek bar do bar saal bhar ke liye main bata rahi hu ki itna complaint agar flow rehta hai to India Mart ka ye norms hai sir to usme kya hai ki wo hame dhyan hi rakhna padega aapke jo bhi product and matlab jo bhi service deti hai aap usme aapke list banaiye ki ha hamara jab while delivering this order ye hamare protocols hai ki hum itne time me deliver karenge itna advance jayega agar product me dikkat hoti hai to itne time me refund karenge to pura aap jab apna billing banate ho customer ke sath me tabhi aap usi me dal kar ke do taki you can nahi nahi main aapko bata rahi hu na taki you can avoid further kuch aisa conflict agar aata bhi hai to you can you can raise your voice ki mere jo hai matlab meri billing me ye sari cheeze jo hai updated hai ki hum log is tarike se deal karte hai uske beyond ja ke complaint aati hai to aisa nahi hai waha pe band kar denge but multiple complaints mein jaha pe matlab wo address ho rahi hai delay ho rahi hai to likh ke doge to aapke paas mein strong point aa jata hai ki meri terms and condition I have mentioned jab billing karte time har customer ko bheji hui hai to us duration se pehle agar buyer concern dalta hai ya uske beyond ja ke concern dalta hai to aapne aapke check points pure kiye hai to waha pe aapko matlab kuch dikkat nahi aati chahe number of point kuch bhi ho because you have terms and conditions ki itne time me pahunchega itne time me aayega ye rahega ye rahega kuch damage hai to iska ye clause hai
Customer: Kabhi kabhi delivery wale bahut late ho jate hai kabhi delay kar dete hai is wajah se service me delay ho jata hai
Executive: Sir dekho tabhi to main aapko bol rahi hu ki utna maximum time aap lekar ke rakh sakte ho na matlab jaise abhi maine kuch order kiya I have ordered few things on me show to usme mere ko jo date likhi thi 11 tarikh to main 11 tak wait kar rahi hu na ki mera product jo hai wo 11 tak aa jayega
Customer: Dekhiye dispatch karte hai turant turant tracking id de dete hai ab wo tracking id me bhi dikhata rehta hai na kab tak ke pahunchega estimate date us pe
Executive: Ha nahi to sir dekho wo exception hum log itna consider karke chalte hai but it is happening multiple time to dekho aisa problem customer ke sath me aata hai
Customer: Buyer se itna hi rehta hai ki hamara to dispatch karne tak hi time rehta hai na hum itne dino me dispatch kar denge karke
Executive: Ha to wo apna dispatch time aapke product me delivery main aapko bata rahi hu ki sir dekho koi bhi jab aata hai aapke aapke jab ye product ke details dalte ho na usme additional information me sari cheeze fill karne ke liye aati hai na sari products me aapke seller me hum log khud dete hai ki aapka delivery time kitna hai 15 din hai 10 din hai aap higher side pe leke chalo na likho waha pe 10 din matlab 10 din hai sa din hai to waha pe mujhe lagta hai ki sa din tak to you will not get a complaint aur koi bhi buyer aisa nahi hai sir jo hand to hand complaint dal dega even buyer waste for some time matlab
Customer: Main to mahine me do hi do ek ya do hi customer hi face kar pata hu deal kar pata hu
Executive: Sir dekho main ha main wahi bol rahi hu ki itna aapko wo manna padega jo main aapko bata rahi hu kyuki wo wo hai procedures to wo follow karne padte hai matlab usme kuch nahi kar sakte to thoda sa aap thoda sa dhyan rakhe main bas itna hi bol rahi hu as of now the resolution has been done aapka jo hai profile resume ho chuka hai and by tomorrow you will start getting the leads aur kal saturday hai na to kal raat ko jo 12 baje wala allocation hota hai weekly allocation wo aapka ho jayega aur daily wali aapko shayad subah milenge ab aaj ka to clone khatam ho gaya hoga to kal subah aapko daily wali milegi aur raat ko aapko jo weekly wali milti hai wo aapko sham ko mil jayegi aur further kuch rehta hai to you can save my number kuch bhi rahega to you can coordinate with me on this number only
Customer: Thank you
Executive: Theek hai sir ha theek hai okay alright thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's services were temporarily suspended.

- Customer facing issues with product delivery delays.

- Customer receives complaints despite selling quality products.



Resolution:

- Executive resolved the service suspension issue.

- Executive advised on managing customer expectations.

- Executive suggested adding delivery protocols to billing.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive leads by tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, verification, delivery, complaints
